description: GraphQL schema builder from different data sources with middleware extensions.

name: graphql-compose

scripts.build: npm run build-cjs && npm run build-mjs && npm run build-esm
scripts.build-cjs: rimraf lib && BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d lib && COPY_TO_FOLDER=lib npm run build-flow && COPY_TO_FOLDER=lib npm run build-ts
scripts.build-esm: rimraf esm && BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d esm && COPY_TO_FOLDER=esm npm run build-flow && COPY_TO_FOLDER=esm npm run build-ts
scripts.build-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo ./${COPY_TO_FOLDER:-lib}$filepath | sed 's/.\/src\//\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.build-mjs: rimraf mjs && BABEL_ENV=mjs babel src --ignore __tests__,__mocks__ -d mjs && yarn build-mjs-rename && COPY_TO_FOLDER=mjs npm run build-flow
scripts.build-ts: find ./src -name '*.d.ts' -not -path '*/__*' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo ./${COPY_TO_FOLDER:-lib}$filepath | sed 's/.\/src\//\//g'`; done
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run tslint
scripts.test: npm run coverage && npm run lint && npm run flow && npm run tscheck
scripts.test-vers: yarn add graphql@0.13.0 --dev && jest && yarn add graphql@14.0.0 --dev && jest
